ModMetaData.description: Core systems and performance toolset for advanced RimWorld 1.6 behaviors. Provides Harmony-based extensions with emphasis on safety, save compatibility, deterministic logic (MP-friendly orientation), and low allocation patterns. Automatically adapts when optional DLC (Royalty / Ideology / Biotech / Anomaly / Odyssey) is present.
